channel.title: About Siobhán Keating, Technical Writer
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Siobhán O'Brien, Technical Writer

item.description: I love to write and I feel my writing helps people understand technology and apply this knowledge to effectively use an application or system. I have 20 years' experience working in the IT sector. I include here some generic examples of my writing, to demonstrate what technical writing means to me and to describe my experience of the docs-as-code workflow. What is a Technical Writer? Best practices for technical documentation What is docs-as-code?
